# <a name="action-confirmations"></a><span data-ttu-id="1134f-102">작업 확인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1134f-102">Action confirmations</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1134f-103">실수로 Outlook.com에서 메시지를 이동 하거나 삭제 한 경우 해당 작업을 실행 취소할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1134f-103">If you accidentally moved or deleted a message in Outlook.com, you can undo that action.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1134f-104">실행 취소 대화 상자가 화면 아래쪽에 5 초 동안 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1134f-104">The undo dialog appears at the bottom of the screen for about 5 seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1134f-105">이동 또는 삭제 작업을 취소 하려면 **실행 취소** 를 선택 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1134f-105">Select **Undo** to cancel the move or delete action.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1134f-106">[작업](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/notifications) 확인에서이 기능을 해제할 수 있습니다 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1134f-106">You can switch off this feature in [Action confirmations](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/notifications) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="1134f-107">**설정** > **모든 Outlook 설정** > **일반** > **알림을**표시 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1134f-107">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Notifications**).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1134f-108">참고: 메시지가 전송 되 면 해당 작업을 실행 취소할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1134f-108">Note: Once a message has been sent, you can't undo that action.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1134f-109">자세한 내용은 [Outlook.com에서 메시지를 회수](https://support.office.com/article/c069ddde-5282-4085-8f4c-d7b133324f8a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)합니다 .를 참조 하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1134f-109">For more information, see [I want to recall a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c069ddde-5282-4085-8f4c-d7b133324f8a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
